segments.text: I see the woman so calmly drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink behind her is flooding the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spilling out, damaging the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be heartbroken when she realizes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the water, slipping hazard ahead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children trying to get cookies, so innocent yet risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool, one wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting patiently, but danger looms.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting a treat, but it's unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside makes it sadder inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them without startling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, caught in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
